title: Ranked Leagues under maintenance ?
body: Since the league system is temporarily unavailable right now because of maintenance what would happen if i still played a ranked game? because i still have the option to do that, when i click the play button.

replies.body: Ranked games will function as normal.  The only noticeable thing will be the profile display.  We'll be keeping updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hope that helps clear things up!
it does thank you very much
